snippet: The 2014 Lincoln Center Festival will feature the Bolshoi Ballet as well as Heisei Nakamura-za, the Japanese Kabuki company.
abstract: Bolshoi Ballet and Bolshoi Opera will perform along with several other international acts at 2014 Lincoln Center Festival.
lead_paragraph: The 2014 Lincoln Center Festival will feature the Bolshoi Ballet as well as Heisei Nakamura-za, the Japanese Kabuki company.

headline.main: Bolshoi to Visit Lincoln Center Festival
headline.print_headline: Bolshoi to Visit Lincoln Center Festival
